name: Yiska the Owlchemist
description:
School Assignment done by 1 person.

Help Yiska the Owlchemist gather special ingredients in his magical forest to brew an elixir that will get him home.

"Yiska the Owlchemist," is a short platformer, puzzle game with easy-to-use mechanics. Good for all ages. Hoo!

How To Play:

Spacebar is Jump.
Use arrowkeys or WASD to walk around.
